feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 09:53 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 08:46 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 08:46 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:46 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
